rows.label: tlk42300042_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you for accepting
the mission, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300042_04_msg0002
rows.name:
The truth is, Ponpon is an undercover
agent for the Invidian army, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300042_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I investigate the situation in
Fons Maim from here and secretly
report it to the army, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300042_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Drunk mercenaries always let snatches
of important information slip.

rows.label: tlk42300042_04_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm also looking for young people to
scout for the Invidian army, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300042_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Collecting various information
is Ponpon's job, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300042_04_msg0007
rows.name:
That's why I know you all so well,
mo. And that's why I was able to
convey the request from the army, mo.
